https://foody.vn/ho-chi-minh/sukiya-com-.user_titlec: Not bad of a deal
https://foody.vn/ho-chi-minh/sukiya-com-.user_comment:
Went here  a bit after 11am. There were people in there but wasn't busy. Once noon came, it became really busy and seats ran out fast. I suggest come early if you want to eat here.

If you want to eat inside, just sit down on any available seating and they'll come get your orders. Take out is available at the cashier station. 

The main entrees is either rice or noodles. Prices are according to sizes, small medium and large. They're are reasonable. A bit cheaper than their competitors across.

They have combos, which aren't bad. We got the combo of noodles and rice with beef with a glass or ice tea for about 80k. Beware though thr size of it is a smaller size than the regular order.

We got a desert too. A coconut mango pop for about 33k. That wasn't worth it. It consists of a lot of mini pieces of bread and maybe 1 scoop of ice cream. Too expensive for what you get
